docs.title: 👋🏼Welcome!
docs.text:
Hey there! My name is Josh and I'm a technical writer.

The goal of this site is for me to:

  • continue to improve on my writing and knowledge management skills,
  • practice writing software and the related documentation, and
  • go hands-on with new trends and best practices in documentation and knowledge management.

Feel free to poke around and contact me if you have any questions!😊

docs.title: Donations
docs.text: Find my projects and documentation helpful? If so, micro-donations are greatly appreciated!

docs.title: Scripts
docs.text:
• app-open-close script

    Script for automating the process of opening a specific app, allowing data to sync, and then close the app.

  • commit-submit-merge script

    Script for automating the commit, submit, and merge process for pull requests in GitHub.

  • remove-folder and copy-folder scripts

    Script for automating the process of copying files from one folder into another folder on Windows.

docs.title: Software
docs.text:
• passGen

    Lightweight Windows app for creating randomly generated, 10-character passwords

docs.title: Tutorials & notes
docs.text:
• Bitcoin Cash Node on a Raspberry Pi

    Tutorials for how to install, set up, and upgrade Bitcoin Cash Node on a Raspberry Pi 4 running Ubuntu Desktop (64-bit)

  • Microsoft Zune & software setup

    Tutorial for how to connect a Microsoft Zune device to the Zune software on Windows

  • My Kindle highlights & notes

    Highlights and notes from books I have read or am currently reading on Kindle

  • TP-Link router hard reset

    Tutorial for how to perform a hard reset on a TP-Link Wi-Fi router
